comments.body: For this, I am wondering if we should also keep it backwards... But I guess maybe it is okay. We just need to make sure we dont run newer version e2e test against old version? @xing-yang I will let you decide.
to run older version of tests against older k8s release, we can checkout older k8s release branch or tag and run e2e tests from there.
Is there any automation for creating the testbed categories/tags, tagging resources, etc., or is this done manually?
Yes. The entire testing process including tagging, policy creation etc.. is automated through a jenkins job.
Can you publish the jenkins job config / script somewhere for folks who don't have access to this jenkins instance?
Updated PR description with the jenkins automation script link.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +59,63 @@
	Testbed description :
	1. cluster-vsan-1 is tagged with zone-a. So, vsanDatastore inherits zone-a since all the hosts under zone-a have vsanDatastore mounted on them.
	2. cluster-vsan-2 is tagged with zone-b. So, vsanDatastore (1) inherits zone-b since all the hosts under zone-b have vsanDatastore (1) mounted on them.
	3. sharedVmfs-0 inherits both zone-a and zone-b since all the hosts in both zone-a and zone-b have this datastore mounted on them.
